main.title: TT_Import and Backup
error.generalMessage: TT_Something went wrong, please try again later.
backup.title: TT_Backup your wallet
backup.explainText1: TT_Select a folder where your wallet backup files will be saved
backup.explainText2: TT_Note: the backed-up wallet file is saved on the computer where NodeCore is running.
backup.validation.folderNotExists: TT_Folder does not exist, do you want to create it?
backup.validation.noAction: TT_Did not create folder, did not do backup
backup_single_selectAddress: TT_Please select an address to backup
backup_single_successPrivateKeyShown: TT_Private key for address %1$s was shown
backup_single_success1: TT_This is the private key to your address.
backup_single_success2:
TT_Anyone with access to this private key can steal any funds held in %1$s!
Make sure that this private key is stored SECURELY!
import.title: TT_Import a wallet
import.importText2: TT_Note that importwallet merges the addresses into the existing wallet, it does NOT overwrite them.
import.validation.fileNotFound: TT_Could not find wallet.dat file, nothing imported
import.validation.fileWrongType: TT_That looks like a wallet config file, not the backup containing the private keys. Nothing was imported.
import.validation.successNetChange: TT_This added %1$s new address(es) with net change of %2$s %3$s
import.validation.successFinalMessage: TT_Wallet imported. New balance is %1$s %2$s. %3$s. Check 'My Addresses' for details.
backup_prompt1: TT_You've changed the wallet by importing a new private key for address %1$s.
import_single_validateKey0: TT_This does not look like a correct private key.
import_single_validateKey1: TT_The private key must be a hexadecimal string.
import_single_validateKey2: TT_The private key should have an even number of characters.
import_single_validateKey3: TT_The private key should be longer.
import_single_keyRequired: TT_Need to enter the private key to import
import_single_areYouSure:
TT_Are you sure you want to import this key?
This will add a new address to your wallet.
The amount in the address will increase your total balance.
The system will need to rebuild the cache of wallet transactions for this new address, so some data may become temporarily stale.
import_single_keyExists: TT_The address %1$s already was in this wallet, nothing changed.
import_single_successFull:
TT_The address %1$s (balance %2$s) was imported.
New total balance for all addresses is %3$s
import_single_techError: TT_There was a technical error. Mostly likey the private key is not valid. Error Details:
